QuestData.Title: Zandalari Treasure Trove
QuestData.Description:
We've looted some quality goods already, but the real reward is still ahead. The big chamber in the back of the ruins is filled with powerful artifacts.
A treasure trove like that is the sort of thing that can save lives and sell for a fortune out here in Vol'dun.
But those specters you killed weren't lying. Their master or king or whatever is very well-protected in there.
We'll have to take this one down as a group. Let me know when you're ready to head up to the chamber.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The specter of a long-dead Zandalari ruler, protected by the souls he's enslaved.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Zak'rajan the Undying in his throne room.
